00019 #include "calvin_files/data/test/DataSetTest_LargeData.h"

00030 using namespace std;
00031 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00032 
00033 // NOTE:
00034 // Requires the exsitance of a large DAT file in affy/sdk/calvin_files/data/data.
00035 // This test is not included in the build because the file is not in CVS.
00036 #define TEST_DATA_LARGE_DAT "../data/large_DAT_file"
00037 
00038 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetTest_LargeData );
00039 
00040 DataSetTest_LargeData::DataSetTest_LargeData()
00041 {
00042         data = 0;
00043         dataPlane = 0;
00044 }
00045 
00046 DataSetTest_LargeData::~DataSetTest_LargeData()
00047 {
00048 
00049 }
00050 
00051 void DataSetTest_LargeData::setUp()
00052 {
00053         data = new GenericData;
00054         GenericFileReader reader;
00055         std::string name = TEST_DATA_LARGE_DAT;
00056         reader.SetFilename(name);
00057         try
00058         {
00059                 reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00060                 dataPlane = data->DataSet(0,0);
00061         }
00062         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException&)
00063         {
00064                 dataPlane = 0;
00065         }
00066 }
00067 
00068 void DataSetTest_LargeData::tearDown()
00069 {
00070         if (dataPlane)
00071                 dataPlane->Delete();
00072         delete data;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void DataSetTest_LargeData::CreationTest()
00076 {
00077         // Check that the DataSet was created.
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00079 }
00080 
00081 // A bug was discovered where requesting
00082 // more than 200MB in GetDataRaw on a
00083 // DataSet with one column (like a DAT)
00084 // caused a crash.
00085 void DataSetTest_LargeData::GetDataRaw300MBTest()
00086 {
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00089 
00090         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00091         int32_t cols = dataPlane->Cols();
00092 
00093         int32_t threeHundredMB = 150000000; // 2 bytes per pixel = 300 MB
00094         u_int16_t* values = new u_int16_t[threeHundredMB];
00095 
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetDataRaw(0, 0, threeHundredMB, values));
00097 
00098         // Check the values
00099         u_int16_t inten = 10;
00100         for (int32_t row = 0; row < 150000000; ++row, ++inten)
00101         {
00102                 if (inten > 46000)
00103                 {
00104                         inten = 0;
00105                 }
00106 
00107                 // Spot check
00108                 if (row % 99 == 0)
00109                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(inten == values[row]);                   
00110 
00111                 // Check at the 200MB boundary.
00112                 if (row >= 99999990 && row < 100000010)
00113                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(inten == values[row]);
00114         }
00115 
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00117 
00118 }
00119 
00120 // A similar problem to the GetDataRaw
00121 // bug above exists in GetData that returns
00122 // a vector.
00123 void DataSetTest_LargeData::GetData300MBTest()
00124 {
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00126         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00127 
00128         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00129         int32_t cols = dataPlane->Cols();
00130 
00131         int32_t threeHundredMB = 150000000; // 2 bytes per pixel = 300MB
00132         Uint16Vector v;
00133 
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(0, 0, threeHundredMB, v));
00135 
00136                 // Check the values
00137         u_int16_t inten = 10;
00138         for (int32_t row = 0; row < 150000000; ++row, ++inten)
00139         {
00140                 if (inten > 46000)
00141                 {
00142                         inten = 0;
00143                 }
00144 
00145                 // Spot check
00146                 if (row % 99 == 0)
00147                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(inten == v[row]);                        
00148 
00149                 // Check at the 200MB boundary.
00150                 if (row >= 99999990 && row < 100000010)
00151                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(inten == v[row]);
00152         }
00153 
00154         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00155 
00156 }
